hello: Hi there! How can I help you?
how you: I'm just a computer program, but thanks for asking!
your name: I'm a chatbot, so I don't have a name. You can call me Chatbot!
fee bca: The fees in BCA right now is around 3.5 lakhs
about bca: BCA is a computer application course
where sit: Siliguri Institute Of Technology is located in Salbari, Sukna
eligiblity criteria: Compilation of 10+2 from a recognized board
minimum percentage: The minimal requirement for BCA eligibility is 50% marks in a 10+2 of equivalent exam with computer application or computer science or maths as an extra or core subject
subjects: Programming languages, data structures, Python, statistics, DBMS, and computer networks
career options: Software developer, Database Administrator, System Analyst, web developer, IT Consultant, Network Administrator
companies: IT Services: TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Cognizant
good morning: Good morning! How can I assist you today?
joke: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
suggest books: Computer Fundamentals - by P.K. Sinha, Introduction to Algorithm - by Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson

good evening: Good evening!  Hope you're having a fabulous day so far! What's on your mind?
good night: Good night!  Sweet dreams and see you bright and early tomorrow!
